PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-06832016-07-08,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 9 (Prince Edward Island)
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, NO. 9 (PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND) in order to amend existing Goods and Services Tax/Harmonized Sales Tax (GST/HST) regulations made under the EXCISE TAX ACT to formalize and give legal effect to Prince Edward Island's decision to increase the rate of its provincial component of the HST.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0212 Publication Date: 2016-07-27
AttachmentsAttachment
